name: PayPal - Hide account completion indicator
description: Remove the annoying `you haven't "completed" your PayPal profile` progress ring and percentage from the portrait on the PayPal summary page.

user.name: ssokolow
user.about: Userstyles.org has a bug which keeps resetting my notification e-mail address. I strongly recommend using the contact form on my blog if you want me to notice. I also sometimes go into more detail about my userstyles on my blog. See the userstyle tag for a list of those.

additional_info: ...because some of us don't have a smartphone to pair up.
